original_text: Throughout all their journeys, whenever the cloud was taken up from over the tabernacle, the people of Israel would set out.
korean_text: 구름이 성막 위에서 떠오를 때에는 이스라엘 자손이 그 모든 행진하는 길에 앞으로 나아갔고

sentences.original_text: whenever the cloud was taken up from over the tabernacle,
sentences.korean_translation: 성막 위에서 구름이 들려 올라갈 때마다,

sentences.original_text: the people of Israel would set out.
